lead_paragraph: Joe D’Andrea and Joe Zandstra joined Magnani Caruso Dutton, New York, in new posts. Mr. D’Andrea becomes director for mobile development; Mr. Zandstra becomes creative director.
snippet: Joe D’Andrea and Joe Zandstra joined Magnani Caruso Dutton, New York, in new posts. Mr. D’Andrea becomes director for mobile development; Mr. Zandstra becomes creative director.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Ad Industry
